document.docAuthor: Ge, Yingqiang, Gao, Yunyun, Yan, Liping, Liu, Xianhui & Zhang, Dong
document.masterDocTitle: Review of the Lispe tentaculata-group (Diptera: Muscidae) in China, with one new synonym

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the Lispe tentaculata-group (Diptera: Muscidae) in China, with one new synonym

caption.paragraph:
FIG. 3. ─ Female abdomen and terminalia of
Lispe consanguinea Loew, 1858
( A , C , E ) and
L. orientalis Wiedemann,1824
( B , D , F ). A , B , dorsal view; C , D , lateral view; E , F , ventral view. Scale bars: 0.50 mm. Abbreviations: see Material and methods.

subSubSection.paragraph: DISTRIBUTION IN CHINA . — Beijing , Gansu , Hebei , Heilongjiang , Jilin , Liaoning , Neimenggu , Shaanxi , Shandong , Shanxi , Xinjiang , Yunnan .

The finger-like protuberances on fore tarsi of
L. consanguinea
and
L. tentaculata
look identical by eyes.However, SEM images of the structure reveal interspecific difference concerning the blunt end of the protuberances ( Fig. 5 ):
L. consanguinea
possesses less thorns ( Fig. 5C ) while
L. tentaculata
has thicker and bended thorns ( Fig. 5F ). More to mention, all these thorns are bifurcate except the middle one in both species ( Fig. 5C, F ).

caption.paragraph:
FIG. 4. ─ Female abdomen and terminalia of
Lispe sericipalpis Stein, 1904
( A , C , E ) and
L. tentaculata (De Geer, 1776)
( B , D , F ). A , B , dorsal views; C , D , lateral views; E , F , ventral view. Scale bars: 0.50 mm. Abbreviations: see Material and methods.

caption.paragraph:
FIG. 5. ─ SEM images of finger-like protuberance on first tarsi of:
Lispe consanguinea Loew, 1858
( A -C ) and
L. tentaculata (De Geer, 1776)
( D -F ), ventral views: A , D , fore tarsi; B , E , finger-like protuberances; C , F , blunt apex of the protuberance. Scale bars: A, D, 400 μm; B, E, 200 μm; C, F, 20 μm. Arrows: the only un- bifurcate middle thorn on the blunt end of the finger-like protuberance.

subSubSection.paragraph: DISTRIBUTION IN CHINA . — Anhui , Beijing , Fujian , Gansu , Guangdong , Guangxi , Guizhou , Hainan , Hebei , Hubei , Hunan , Jilin , Jiangsu , Liaoning , Shanghai , Shaanxi , Sichuan , Taiwan, Zhejiang , Yunnan .
